user.title: Huawei Cloud Service Configuration
user.description:
Please configure the Huawei Cloud service connection.

For configuration help, please visit:
https://github.com/MagicStarTrace/huawei_cloud

data.enable_gaode_more_info: Show Amap in device details page (requires gaode_maps)

init.title: Huawei Cloud Service Options
init.description:
Configure location update interval and Amap API.

For configuration help, please visit:
https://github.com/MagicStarTrace/huawei_cloud

data.use_page_location: Enable active positioning (trigger Huawei Cloud real-time location)
data.enable_gaode_more_info: Show Amap in device details page (requires gaode_maps)

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to Playwright service. Please check the service URL and network connection.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please check your username and password.
error.base_url_required: Playwright service URL cannot be empty.
error.invalid_url: Invalid Playwright service URL format. Must start with http:// or https://.

abort.already_configured: This Huawei Cloud service is already configured.

progress.connecting: Verifying configuration and connecting to service...

force_sync.name: Force Sync
force_sync.description: Immediately trigger a device location sync, ignoring the polling interval.
